title: PIC EXL : Upset Annie Kilner is seen for the first time since husband Kyle Walker CCTV emerged
body_text:
PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Upset Annie Kilner is seen for the first time since husband Kyle Walker 'flashed and kissed a woman in a bar' AND new Vardy Wag row
- The model, 30, shares three children with Kyle, who has allegedly been caught on video flashing and kissing a woman
- Annie is also thought to be furious at Rebekah Vardy, who branded her a 'doormat' and accused her of deflecting attention
Kyle Walker's wife Annie Kilner was seen for the first time since the Man City star allegedly flashed and kissed another woman in a Vodka Revolution bar.
The £150,000-a-week England star was seen apparently pulling down his trousers in the venue, believed to be in Wilmslow, Cheshire, during 90 minutes of alleged lewd behaviour on Sunday.
The model, 30, who shares three children with Kyle, appeared downcast and was still wearing her wedding ring.
Annie bundled up in a blue padded coat which she wore over a black top and skin-tight leggings.
She donned a pair of trainers during the outing and appeared to be on the phone as she got into her car.
Upset: Kyle Walker's wife Annie Kilner was seen for the first time since the Man City star allegedly flashed and kissed another woman in a Vodka Revolution bar
Drama: The model, 30, who shares three children with Kyle, appeared downcast and was still wearing her wedding ring
Leicester City WAG Rebekah Vardy has ignited another WAG feud as she hit out at Kyle Walker's wife Annie Kilner - here FEMAIL reveals how the two women shape up in a head to head
Annie went makeup free during the outing, showing off her natural beauty, while scraping her raven tresses back into a ponytail.
Lauryn Goodman has weighed in on the current feud between close friend Rebekah Vardy and Annie, the wife of her former flame Kyle.
The model shares son Kairo with the footballer, after she fell pregnant following a short relationship with Kyle, while he was temporarily split from wife Annie.
Appearing to slam her love rival on Friday, the model, who is now pregnant with her second child, seemingly accused Annie of calling Kairo, who would now be her stepson, 'horrific' names.
She penned on Instagram: 'Stop igniting the flame claiming others want the limelight. Stop trying to make out you want a private life.
'How many friends do you want to blame?
'It's come back to me what horrific things you have been calling my son. (Words I wouldn't wish to repeat because I wouldn't want it out there for him to read when he's older).'
She finished the post by saying: 'Just remember what goes around comes around.'
The stance appeared to be a show of solidarity to Rebekah, who is involved in a row with Annie after accusing her of 'playing the victim' earlier this week.
The wife of Jamie Vardy, 41, branded Annie, 30, a 'doormat' and accused her of deflecting attention as her husband Kyle Walker, 32, is facing a police probe after allegedly flashing and kissing another woman in a Vodka Revolution bar.
Annie was reportedly annoyed at Becky, thinking she made a pointed barb in relation to her post breaking her silence on her marriage drama. Annie's original post read: 'I think it's important to remember that no matter how good you are to people, it won't make them good to you.'
Becky had written on Instagram: 'The gift that keeps on giving' but later said the post was nothing about Annie, who is 'obsessed' with her.
Uploading a response, a furious Becky wrote: 'Waking up this morning to my name being associated with this delightful story in yet another opportunity to attack me!
Marriage: The model shares three children with Walker, who she first met when they were both in their teens
Low-key: Annie went makeup free during the outing, showing off her natural beauty, while scraping her raven tresses back into a ponytail
Casual: Annie bundled up in a blue padded coat which she wore over a black top and skin-tight leggings
Tense: It comes after Annie's husband was seen apparently pulling down his trousers in the venue, believed to be in Wilmslow, Cheshire, during 90 minutes of alleged lewd behaviour on Sunday
'Stop igniting the flame': Lauryn Goodman has weighed in on the current feud between close friend Rebekah Vardy and Annie Kilner, the wife of her former flame Kyle Walker
'Funny though isn't it that it's my name she wants to use rather than the people actually laughing at her for being a doormat.
'Art of deflection to a T… great at playing the victim is our Annie.
'I think she needs to focus with what's going on in her own life instead of trying to attack me by bringing me into her drama (laughing emoji).
'Believe me had it been about her I would have tagged her! She's obsessed… I'm literally tired of being nice to people with short memories.
'I've stayed silent while she's bashed me in the media made lies up about me in her little community like a group of playground bullies! Just leave me alone.'
Becky accompanied the post by Michael Jackson's Smooth Criminal, with the lyrics: 'Annie, are you okay? So, Annie, are you okay? Are you okay, Annie?'
Pals close to Annie told The Sun the WAG is 'furious Becky is dragging her name through the mud'.
They said: 'She's always disliked but now she despises her and doesn't care who knows it. Annie has kept a dignified silence but Becky mocking her as a ''victim'' has made her see red.
'Annie is furious that someone like Becky has had the audacity to run her down in public like this. She has kept a dignified silence throughout and now Becky has come out swinging.
'Calling Annie a 'doormat' and the rest of her vitriol is the straw that has broken the camel's back. She thinks Becky is just using her attention because, as Annie says, Becky thrives off the limelight.'
MailOnline has contacted Becky's representative for comment.
Annie previously defended Coleen Rooney in Vardy's famous Wagatha Christie legal battle .
The WAG weighed in on the war between Rooney and Vardy in 2020 and said Becky wanted to be 'the next Victoria Beckham' who 'enjoys the limelight'.
Annie, who is friends with Coleen Rooney, was dragged into the Wagatha libel trial between her and Becky in 2022.
During her High Court legal battle, Becky said that Annie was behind a posed photo at the 2018 World Cup in Russia. Annie did not comment publicly at the time.
Becky's fury comes after the brunette beauty shared a cryptic message on her Instagram about the drama surrounding her marriage, after Man City star Kyle allegedly flashed and kissed another woman in a Vodka Revolution bar.
The £150,000-a-week England star was seen apparently pulling down his trousers in the venue, believed to be in Wilmslow, Cheshire, during 90 minutes of alleged lewd behaviour on Sunday.
Furious: Rebekah has ignited another WAG feud as she hit out at Kyle Walker's wife Annie Kilner in an impassioned post on Instagram and Thursday
Annoyed: 'I think she needs to focus with what's going on in her own life instead of trying to attack me by bringing me into her drama (laughing emoji)', Becky wrote
WAG war: Annie was reportedly annoyed at Becky thinking she made a pointed barb after her post: 'I think it's important to remember that no matter how good you are to people, it won't make them good to you'
Not long afterwards, on Monday evening, Annie shared the post with her thousands of followers which read: 'I think it's important to remember that no matter how good you are to people, it won't make them good to you.'
The model shares three children with Walker, who she first met when they were both in their teens.
Cheshire Police on Thursday confirmed it is investigating Walker for alleged indecent exposure - but MailOnline understands that Manchester City believe Walker has not broken any club rules and deem it a private matter.
Kyle is training as usual before the Premier League champions travel to face Crystal Palace in London on Saturday.
A police spokesman said: 'On Wednesday March 8, Cheshire police were made aware of a video circulating on social media in relation to an indecent exposure which allegedly occurred in the Wilmslow area.
'Enquiries in relation to the incident are in the early stages and no arrests have been made at this time.'
The Sun reports that the woman he appears to touch on the breasts and kiss is not his wife because the woman in the CCTV is blonde and Ms Kilner has brown hair.
MailOnline has asked Manchester City, Mr Walker's agent and Greater Manchester Police to comment.
The Sun published footage of the incidents.
The Manchester City defender, 32, appears to grind behind the woman while at the Manchester venue, which he arrived at with male friends at 5.20pm on Sunday after they had some drinks.
Revellers on a night out were reportedly shocked by the horrific behaviour which went on for around 90 minutes until 7pm.
Walker reported on time for Manchester City training on Tuesday morning before controversial footage of a night out hit the headlines.
City's players were given two days off following the weekend victory over Newcastle United, with many of the squad travelling abroad for short breaks.
Walker remained in the North West and was back in training with Pep Guardiola's squad before they travel to face Crystal Palace on Saturday.
The drunken footballer appeared to drop his tracksuit bottoms and reveal himself near drinkers in the bar in footage seen by The Sun.
In response, one of the two women in his group screamed and pointed as Walker laughed with a friend.
The England and Man City football star then appears to expose himself again after just a few minutes - and only a few feet away from two other women sitting in a booth at the bar, according to the Sun's report.
He is then said to have walked over to shake their hands and say hello.
More videos from the night seem to show him 'pawing' at one of his female friends' breasts and kissing her. His wife was not in any of the footage seen by the Sun.
Football: Walker was seen back in training with City on Thursday before their match against Crystal Palace on Saturday
